meanings.definition: A group of RNA viruses that are enveloped and have a single-stranded positive-sense genome.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying togaviruses to understand their genetic makeup.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are researching ways to combat togaviruses effectively.
meanings.sent3: The togaviruses decided to throw a party inside the human body.
meanings.sent4: The spread of togaviruses in the community was like a silent invasion.
meanings.sent5: The image of togaviruses under the microscope was fascinating.

meanings.definition: Any virus belonging to the family Togaviridae, which includes the genus Alphavirus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor identified the presence of togaviruses in the patient's blood sample.
meanings.sent2: Togaviruses can cause various diseases in both humans and animals.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous togaviruses played hide-and-seek with the immune system.
meanings.sent4: The impact of togaviruses on the body was like a tiny army attacking.
meanings.sent5: The danger posed by togaviruses was evident in the research findings.
